tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE water_usage_monitoring (
  facility_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  water_flow_rate DECIMAL(10,2),
  water_pressure DECIMAL(10,2),
  water_temperature DECIMAL(5,2),
  PRIMARY KEY (facility_id, timestamp)
)

CREATE TABLE production_facilities (
    facility_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    facility_name VARCHAR(255),
    city VARCHAR(255),
    state VARCHAR(255),
    water_usage DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE water_usage_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    facility_id INT,
    log_date DATE,
    water_consumption DECIMAL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_facility_id FOREIGN KEY (facility_id) REFERENCES production_facilities(facility_id)
);

CREATE TABLE WaterMeters (
  meter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  facility_id INT,
  meter_type TEXT,
  meter_reading FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (facility_id) REFERENCES Facilities(facility_id)
);

CREATE TABLE WaterConsumption (
  consumption_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  meter_id INT,
  consumption_date DATE,
  consumption_amount FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (meter_id) REFERENCES WaterMeters(meter_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SustainabilityMetrics (
  metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  facility_id INT,
  metric_name TEXT,
  metric_value FLOAT,
  foreign key (facility_id) references Facilities(facility_id)
);

CREATE TABLE WaterSources (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  source_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  water_capacity DECIMAL,
  last_inspection_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE WaterConsumption (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  source_id INT NOT NULL,
  consumption_date DATE,
  consumption_amount DECIMAL,
  CONSTRAINT fk_water_sources FOREIGN KEY (source_id) REFERENCES WaterSources(id)
);

CREATE TABLE FacilityWaterUsage (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  facility_id INT NOT NULL,
  source_id INT NOT NULL,
  usage_date DATE,
  water_used DECIMAL,
  CONSTRAINT fk_production_facilities FOREIGN KEY (facility_id) REFERENCES ProductionFacilities(id),
  CONSTRAINT fk_water_sources FOREIGN KEY (source_id) REFERENCES WaterSources(id)
);
